float.name: outer_height
float.comment:
Based on the comments, it feels like this should be less than 0 and it traditionally has been. However, through testing, it seems like even if this is set to 0, units are still able to see below them just fine.
NOTE: Jianfu suggested that this may exist just to soften the slope of the lampshade. -Brock 2017

template_reference.name: exts
template_reference.comment: Note; I currently set the combat slot to not receive attack commands and furthermore the weapon has 1000s aim time because I didn't want to have it attacking units on the campaign map outside of what they've already setup.

bool.name: uses_posture_speed
bool.comment: this will go extinct, do not set this to true, it will cause issues with locomotion
